16  package org.apache.ibatis.submitted.cache;
17  
18  import java.io.Reader;
19  import java.sql.Connection;
20  
21  import junit.framework.Assert;
22  
23  import org.apache.ibatis.io.Resources;
24  import org.apache.ibatis.jdbc.ScriptRunner;
25  import org.apache.ibatis.session.SqlSession;
26  import org.apache.ibatis.session.SqlSessionFactory;
27  import org.apache.ibatis.session.SqlSessionFactoryBuilder;
28  import org.junit.Before;
29  import org.junit.Test;
30  
31  // issue #524
32  public class CacheTest {
33  
34    private static SqlSessionFactory sqlSessionFactory;
35  
36    @Before
37    public void setUp() throws Exception {
38      // create a SqlSessionFactory
39      Reader reader = Resources.getResourceAsReader("org/apache/ibatis/submitted/cache/mybatis-config.xml");
40      sqlSessionFactory = new SqlSessionFactoryBuilder().build(reader);
41      reader.close();
42  
43      // populate in-memory database
44      SqlSession session = sqlSessionFactory.openSession();
45      Connection conn = session.getConnection();
46      reader = Resources.getResourceAsReader("org/apache/ibatis/submitted/cache/CreateDB.sql");
47      ScriptRunner runner = new ScriptRunner(conn);
48      runner.setLogWriter(null);
49      runner.runScript(reader);
50      reader.close();
51      session.close();
52    }
53    
54    /*
55     * Test Plan: 
56     *  1) SqlSession 1 executes "select * from A".
57     *  2) SqlSession 1 closes.
58     *  3) SqlSession 2 executes "delete from A where id = 1"
59     *  4) SqlSession 2 executes "select * from A"
60     *
61     * Assert:
62     *   Step 4 returns 1 row. (This case fails when caching is enabled.)
63     */
64    @Test
65    public void testplan1() {
66      SqlSession sqlSession1 = sqlSessionFactory.openSession(false);
67      try {
68        PersonMapper pm = sqlSession1.getMapper(PersonMapper.class);
69        Assert.assertEquals(2, pm.findAll().size());
70      }
71      finally {
72        sqlSession1.close();
73      }
74      
75      SqlSession sqlSession2 = sqlSessionFactory.openSession(false);
76      try {
77        PersonMapper pm = sqlSession2.getMapper(PersonMapper.class);
78        pm.delete(1);
79        Assert.assertEquals(1, pm.findAll().size());
80      }
81      finally {
82        sqlSession2.commit();
83        sqlSession2.close();
84      }
85    }
86    
87    /*
88     * Test Plan: 
89     *  1) SqlSession 1 executes "select * from A".
90     *  2) SqlSession 1 closes.
91     *  3) SqlSession 2 executes "delete from A where id = 1"
92     *  4) SqlSession 2 executes "select * from A"
93     *  5) SqlSession 2 rollback
94     *  6) SqlSession 3 executes "select * from A"
95     *
96     * Assert:
97     *   Step 6 returns 2 rows. 
98     */
99    @Test
100   public void testplan2() {
101     SqlSession sqlSession1 = sqlSessionFactory.openSession(false);
102     try {
103       PersonMapper pm = sqlSession1.getMapper(PersonMapper.class);
104       Assert.assertEquals(2, pm.findAll().size());
105     }
106     finally {
107       sqlSession1.close();
108     }
109     
110     SqlSession sqlSession2 = sqlSessionFactory.openSession(false);
111     try {
112       PersonMapper pm = sqlSession2.getMapper(PersonMapper.class);
113       pm.delete(1);
114     }
115     finally {
116       sqlSession2.rollback();
117       sqlSession2.close();
118     }
119     
120     SqlSession sqlSession3 = sqlSessionFactory.openSession(false);
121     try {
122       PersonMapper pm = sqlSession3.getMapper(PersonMapper.class);
123       Assert.assertEquals(2, pm.findAll().size());
124     }
125     finally {
126       sqlSession3.close();
127     }
128   }
129   
130   /*
131    * Test Plan with Autocommit on:
132    *  1) SqlSession 1 executes "select * from A".
133    *  2) SqlSession 1 closes.
134    *  3) SqlSession 2 executes "delete from A where id = 1"
135    *  4) SqlSession 2 closes.
136    *  5) SqlSession 2 executes "select * from A".
137    *  6) SqlSession 3 closes.
138    *
139    * Assert:
140    *   Step 6 returns 1 row. 
141    */
142   @Test
143   public void testplan3() {
144     SqlSession sqlSession1 = sqlSessionFactory.openSession(true);
145     try {
146       PersonMapper pm = sqlSession1.getMapper(PersonMapper.class);
147       Assert.assertEquals(2, pm.findAll().size());
148     }
149     finally {
150       sqlSession1.close();
151     }
152     
153     SqlSession sqlSession2 = sqlSessionFactory.openSession(true);
154     try {
155       PersonMapper pm = sqlSession2.getMapper(PersonMapper.class);
156       pm.delete(1);
157     }
158     finally {
159       sqlSession2.close();
160     }
161     
162     SqlSession sqlSession3 = sqlSessionFactory.openSession(true);
163     try {
164       PersonMapper pm = sqlSession3.getMapper(PersonMapper.class);
165       Assert.assertEquals(1, pm.findAll().size());
166     }
167     finally {
168       sqlSession3.close();
169     }
170   }
171 
172 }
